message:
Add CRUD functions for decks and voices

- get_user_decks(): list all visible decks with voice counts
- get_deck_with_voices(): full deck details + voices
- create_deck(), update_deck(), delete_deck(): deck lifecycle
- fork_deck(): copy system deck to user deck (with all voices)
- create_voice(), update_voice(), delete_voice(): voice lifecycle
- fork_voice(): copy voice to user deck

All functions enforce ownership checks for security.
Tested with comprehensive test_crud.py (9 test cases).
